Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Enzyme Inhibitor/Aurora Kinase Inhibitor/Aurora Kinase Inhibitor PF-03814735
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: An aurora kinase inhibitor with potential antineoplastic activity. PF-03814735 binds to and inhibits aurora kinases, serine-threonine kinases that play essential roles in mitotic checkpoint control during mitosis. Inhibition of aurora kinases may result in an inhibition of cellular division and proliferation in tumor cells that overexpress aurora kinases.
